experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.full_description:
Reduced time to render user buddy lists by 75% by implementing a prediction algorithm
◦ Integrated iChat with Spotlight Search by creating a tool to extract metadata from saved chat transcripts
and provide metadata to a system-wide search database
◦ Redesigned chat file format and implemented backward compatibility for search

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.full_description:
Designed a UI for the VS open file switcher (Ctrl-Tab) and extended it to tool windows
◦ Created a service to provide gradient across VS and VS add-ins, optimizing its performance via caching
◦ Built an app to compute the similarity of all methods in a codebase, reducing the time from O(n2) to
O(n log n)
◦ Created a test case generation tool that creates random XML docs from XML Schema
◦ Automated the extraction and processing of large datasets from legacy systems using SQL and Perl scripts
